sentence: A new guru, Spiros "Sig" Segalas, was featured in Barron's recently as one of only four consistent market-beating managers to meet stringent criteria but somehow manage to fly under the radar.
Barron's found Segalas while looking domestic stock funds that outperformed the Standard & Poor's 5…… index over the long term - one, three, five, -… and -5 years - under the same manager.
He has run Harbor Capital Appreciation (HCAIX), a firm with $-5.7 billion in assets under management, since -99….

One of the managers Barron's called "venerated by the industry, but not exactly household names," Segalas beat the index over all time periods: In the short term with --% versus -.8% over one year, and over the long term with --.8% versus -…% annualized over -5 years.
Segalas uses bottom-up analysis to evaluate companies, seeking strong balance sheets and capable management, but he also wants them to have above-average earnings growth potential and sales momentum.
The strategy explains much of his more than tripling the market last year: -…-5's stock champions, Netflix Inc. ( NFLX ) and Amazon ( AMZN ), stand out in his -… biggest holdings.
Alphabet Inc. (GOOGL) and Facebook Inc. ( FB ) are at the top.
At the end of the first quarter, the Harbor Capital Appreciation Fund had '9.4% of equity assets allocated to information technology stocks, followed by consumer discretionary at '-.-%.
It has an adjusted price-earnings ratio of -9.…' and annualized turnover of '7%.
